comment.brief: The first and last point are assumed to overlap and create an continuous path. A straight line segment will be added, post smoothing, to cover any gap.
comment.full: The first and last point are assumed to overlap and create an continuous path. A straight line segment will be added, post smoothing, to cover any gap.

comment.brief: An extra line segment is introduced between the last and first points. This is done prior to the smoothing calculations.
comment.full: An extra line segment is introduced between the last and first points. This is done prior to the smoothing calculations.
